resources.string: You must enter name of level pack!
You must choose or write nicest level\'s number!
Problem with creating nice level\'s preview!
No active network connection, please enable some...
There was a network problem, check network settings or try again later... If problem persists, please contact author from menu - "About screen"
Level pack with that name exists!
Click Overwrite if you want to update your levels, or click Cancel to abort upload.
Only levels created by you can be uploaded, not the default ones. Note that if you enter Level Pack Name same as you\'ve already uploaded in the past, it will be overwritten.
Choose nickname carefully, it cannot be changed later.
Only levels created by you can be uploaded.
